author: AFP
title: COVID-19 | Virus gives Easter a bitter taste for Belgian chocolatiers
description: Belgium’s confectioners have handed over 13 million eggs, rabbits and sweet biscuits to the country’s hospitals so far during the coronavirus outbreak
content:
In a normal year, Easter is boom time for Belgiums famed chocolatiers who churn out eggs, bunnies and gift boxes for tourists and locals alike.
But 2020 is not a normal year. The coronavirus and the resulting public lockdown have melted away their hopes.
No… [+3302 chars]
